channel.title: Cant portforward, need help with utorrent
channel.description: i dont know my router password, and i once i do the steps for utorrent, i can no longer log back into my server. any tips are appreciated. you can message me through msn: bgoodale82@hotmail.com or just leave comments below

item.title: Cant portforward, need help with utorrent
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

reset router, or try your wifi password

@KempiScape wrote:

Reset your router, or ask someone who might know the password.

good luck man, i had this problem too a while ago

item.title: Cant portforward, need help with utorrent
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:3, topic:450701”][quote author=deadlyhorror link=topic=553581.msg4056317#msg4056317 date=1342998585]
utorrent is awful when it comes to hosting, just make sure you always have utorrent running, but sometimes it doesnt work, so if u cant host with your router try using hamachi
[/quote]
No No No…don’t give up!!! don’t use Hamachi, just keep trying and asking, I can help you easily, Hamachi is for faggots who can’t open up their ports.[/quote]

well i only said that cuz he obviously says he doesnt know his router password…

Read full topic

item.title: Cant portforward, need help with utorrent

item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

deadlyhorror:

utorrent is awful when it comes to hosting, just make sure you always have utorrent running, but sometimes it doesnt work, so if u cant host with your router try using hamachi

No No No…don’t give up!!! don’t use Hamachi, just keep trying and asking, I can help you easily, Hamachi is for faggots who can’t open up their ports.
